channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: India has long promised 'vibrant' border villages, as China speedily builds up
item.description: India's government launched a Vibrant Villages Programme almost four years ago. But as China steadily builds up its side, Indian residents wonder what's taking so long.
item.content:encoded:
India's government launched a Vibrant Villages Programme almost four years ago. But as China steadily builds up its side, Indian residents wonder what's taking so long.

(Image credit: Omkar Khandekar)
item.dc:creator: Omkar Khandekar

item.title: Rev. Jesse Jackson has died. And, U.S. and Iran set for high-stakes nuclear talks
item.description: Longtime civil rights leader Rev. Jesse Jackson dies at age 84. And, the U.S. and Iran are set for high-stakes negotiations today in Geneva about Iran's nuclear program.
item.content:encoded:
Longtime civil rights leader Rev. Jesse Jackson dies at age 84. And, the U.S. and Iran are set for high-stakes negotiations today in Geneva about Iran's nuclear program.

(Image credit: Harold Cunningham)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: The record-breaking cocaine boom â€” and its deadly fallout
item.description: Cocaine has made a roaring comeback, and it's having some big negative effects in the U.S. and around the world.
item.content:encoded:
Cocaine has made a roaring comeback, and it's having some big negative effects in the U.S. and around the world.

(Image credit: LUIS ROBAYO)
item.dc:creator: Greg Rosalsky

item.title: Longtime civil rights leader the Rev. Jesse Jackson dies at 84
item.description: The Rev. Jesse Jackson was a lifelong civil rights advocate until his death Tuesday at the age of 84.
item.content:encoded:
The Rev. Jesse Jackson was a lifelong civil rights advocate until his death Tuesday at the age of 84.

(Image credit: Jason Mendez)
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: Immigration crackdown in Maine is a top issue in battle for key Senate seat
item.description: President Trump's immigration policy is complicating Republicans' attempts to maintain control of Congress. A recent crackdown in Maine, for instance, put the focus on GOP Sen. Susan Collins.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump's immigration policy is complicating Republicans' attempts to maintain control of Congress. A recent crackdown in Maine, for instance, put the focus on GOP Sen. Susan Collins.

(Image credit: Joseph Prezioso)
item.dc:creator: Kevin Miller

item.title: Minnesota Republicans defend their focus on fraud despite the ICE surge that followed
item.description: Minnesota Republicans say they were right to invite social media influencers into the state to highlight social service fraud, though Democrats blame Republicans for paving the way for the ICE surge.
item.content:encoded:
Minnesota Republicans say they were right to invite social media influencers into the state to highlight social service fraud, though Democrats blame Republicans for paving the way for the ICE surge.

(Image credit: Brendan Smialowski)
item.dc:creator: Dana Ferguson

item.title: A once-underused immigration enforcement program has exploded under Trump
item.description: Partnerships between ICE and local law enforcement agencies has expanded widely, under the second Trump administration, data analyzed by NPR shows.
item.content:encoded:
Partnerships between ICE and local law enforcement agencies has expanded widely, under the second Trump administration, data analyzed by NPR shows.

(Image credit: Kayla Bartkowski/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: 3 big changes are proposed for FEMA. This is what experts really think of them
item.description: The Trump administration is proposing massive changes to the Federal Emergency Management Agency. We asked disaster experts to weigh in.
item.content:encoded:
The Trump administration is proposing massive changes to the Federal Emergency Management Agency. We asked disaster experts to weigh in.

(Image credit: Ronaldo Schemidt)
item.dc:creator: Lauren Sommer

item.title: TV antennas and Super Bowl rehearsals: How prediction market traders seek an edge
item.description: As prediction markets boom, competition is heating up. So traders go the extra mile for a fraction-of-a-second advantage or to sleuth out information nobody else has. It can lead to a huge payday.
item.content:encoded:
As prediction markets boom, competition is heating up. So traders go the extra mile for a fraction-of-a-second advantage or to sleuth out information nobody else has. It can lead to a huge payday.

(Image credit: Patrick T. Fallon)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: This behavior can be a turning point for families caring for a dementia patient
item.description: Wandering, and "elopement," are frightening and dangerous behaviors by people with dementia. For some families, it is the point when they begin to seek institutional care for their loved one.
item.content:encoded: Wandering, and "elopement," are frightening and dangerous behaviors by people with dementia. For some families, it is the point when they begin to seek institutional care for their loved one.
item.dc:creator: Ashley Milne-Tyte
